New Records: Merih Demiral scored the fastest ever goal in a European Championship knockout match
Key Match Events: Merih Demiral scored in each half to guide Turkey to a 2-1 victory over Austria
Michael Gregoritsch scored for Austria in the 66th minute
Christoph Baumgartner's header was kept out by a stunning one-handed save from Gunok in stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Turkey coach Vincenzo Montella emphasized the importance of team spirit
Austria coach Ralf Rangnick predicted that the team would have a chance to win if the game had gone to extra time
Post-Match Reflections: Turkey coach Vincenzo Montella described the match as a historic result and a step forward for the team
Austria coach Ralf Rangnick believed that the team had the necessary chances to win but lacked luck
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thousands of Turks took to the streets in Germany to celebrate the victory
The match was played in pouring rain
